DataElement.preferredName: Primary Tumor Site Excision Post Induction Therapy Not Performed Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text response to describe the reason why the primary tumor site was not excised post induction therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Neoplasm Excision Post Induction Therapy Not Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tumor at the original site of origin._The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The first choice of treatment for a particular type of cancer._An indicator that specifies that an activity did not occur.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor at the original site of origin._The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
